He also kept giving the family reassurances in order to manage panic and stress for us care givers. Thanks to him, I now have 90 year old COVID recovered Dadu whoâ€™s feeling absolutely fine.

tags: Wait time,
review: I took an appointment for 5pm. when I went there I was told doc is only coming at 6:30pm and that too a different doc. on asking why they accepted the appointment timing, I was told that they were going to call me at 5 pm to tell me about the change. so it was a misuse  of time, energy and when you are sick, it bites even more as one tired and low on energy. practo should also coordinate better on these fronts.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: He will give genuine suggestions,proper guidance,He is a great human being. Gives minimum medicines, no unnecessary tests and very positive attitude towards patient. He believes in healing the body through minimal medicine and natural recovery. Rare to find such a doctor in today's world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have never came across any doctor as friendly and as knowledgeable like Dr Dhrumil. He listens you properly and explains you everything in detail rather than just prescribing any medicines and never asks for unnecessary follow ups. 
Felt quite comfortable in interacting with the Dr.
A perfect family doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I want to express my sincere appreciation for effective treatment, quick recovery and constant follow-ups by the doctor. The best part about the doctor is that he's literally available 24*7. 
I would blindly trust his skills & would highly recommend him for any health concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Dhrumil explains in detail about the symptoms, the illness and the medicines he is prescribing, which is very rare. The thing I liked the most apart from the above is that his data bank and software. He has a track record of all the visits you have had with him which includes the reasons for visits and also the meds prescribed by him, so it becomes very easy to understand the patient's medical history.
